text:
所以"鳴雷聲"的主戰使用期限並不長
但已經抽了的玩家們也不用氣餒
因為"助戰"方面 還是可以使用
然後重點！
助戰"冰谷駒" 必抽
因為它的特技 會提升"所有傷害"
而且目標越遠效果就越強
對於我們這種遠距離角色來說
是絕佳的效果
所以心願的部分
我不建議重複抽取
盡可能選擇不同的會比較好
然後 其他像是
不可見之友、咖波力量
、比快更快、技巧提升、再現
trans:
So the main battle period of "Thunderclap" is not long
But players who have already drawn it don’t need to be discouraged
Because it can still be used in terms of "battle assist"
Then here is the main point!
To help fight "Ice Valley Horse", you must draw it
Because its special skill will increase "all damage"
And the further away the target is, the stronger the effect will be
For remote characters of ours
It's an excellent effect
So for the wish part
I do not recommend repeated drawing
It would be better to choose different ones as much as possible
Then, for others such as
Invisible Friend, Kapo Power
, Faster than Fast, Skill Improvement, Reappearance
